mapper.select: SELECT member_idx ,member_type ,member_name ,member_id ,member_passwd ,member_phone ,member_email ,member_birth ,member_gender ,member_join_date FROM member WHERE member_id = #{sId}

SELECT b.booking_idx ,s.store_name , b.booking_date , b.booking_time , b.booking_num , b.booking_seat , b.booking_content , b.store_idx , b.member_id , b.merchant_uid FROM booking b JOIN store s ON b.store_idx = s.store_idx WHERE b.member_id = #{sId} AND concat(b.booking_date, " " ,b.booking_time) > now() ORDER BY booking_idx DESC;
SELECT r.review_idx , s.store_name , r.review_star , r.review_date FROM review r JOIN store s ON s.store_idx = r.store_idx WHERE r.member_id = #{sId}
